document.full_text: u.s. health insurers offering private medicare advantage plans will see an average net 0.4 percent increase in federal reimbursements next year, the centers for medicare and medicaid services said on monday.
document.title: medicare advantage repayments to rise 0.4 percent
lines_and_colors: u.s. health insurers offering private medicare advantage plans will see an average net 0.4 percent increase in federal reimbursements next year, the centers for medicare and medicaid services said on monday.
